app_descript:
Brief: Hole.io is an engaging and competitive game where you control a voracious black hole, aiming to devour everything in your path in a dynamic arena. As you consume objects, your black hole grows, allowing you to engulf larger items and outmaneuver competing holes. Embrace the chaos and strategy as you navigate through various environments to establish yourself as the dominant void in the urban landscape.
